content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day July 17, 2017 Distributed Computing Systems Legitimate  Useful Botnets July 17, 2017 Although the term botnet is generally associated with cybercrime and maliciousness, it should come as no surprise that there are, in fact, fully legitimate and entirely useful botnetsbetter known as distributed computing systemsat work around the globe.
